title: Pastry Shop
description:
Mock of an cake shop e-commerce page

Technologies used:
- React-Redux
- React-Reuter
- Express
- Nodejs
- Cypress

title: Chat App
description:
Simple app for signup login and posting comments on a thread.

Technologies used:
- ReactJS
- useContext
- react-router
- axios
- nodejs
- express
- mogoose
JWT for authorization and authentication
Cypress for CI testing
It implement CRUD methods for the user account and the comments posted.

title: Trivia Quiz App
description:
This is a solo project from the Scrimba course on React.

The app fetch 5 questions from https://opentdb.com/ API.

It keep track of the correct and incorrect answers of each question in a state and calculate your final score.

title: Picture Shop
description:
This project is a React practice project that simulates a shop that sell pictures

Libraries used:
- react-routes
- useContext
- custom hooks

title: Supplies Database Manager
description: App than can use CRUD methods to manipulate a mongo data base

title: Profile Card
description:
This is a static digital profile card. It's part of a scrimba react course challenge.

Technologies used:
- HTML
- CSS
- Javascript
- React

title: Color Picker
description: It's a solo project from a scrimba course. You pick an color from the color picker a theme from a dropdown menu and send a request to the site https://www.thecolorapi.com/ for an object with 5 colors, we then paint the columns with them.

title: Tenizes Game
description: Roll the dices until every dice is the same. Click on any dice to freeze it.
